name: InfluenzaVaccine
title: Influenza Vaccine
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent influenza vaccines.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Immunization.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with CVX concepts related to influenza vaccines.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes HCPCS, SNOMED CT and CPT influenza vaccine codes.)
